continents.name: Elyria
continents.description: A vast continent spanning across the northern hemisphere, known for its lush forests, snow-capped mountains, and sprawling cities.

continents.name: Nefaria
continents.description: A land of dark magic and ancient ruins, shrouded in perpetual shadow. Home to the enigmatic and powerful sorcerers.

countries.name: Eldrador
countries.description: A kingdom of wisdom and knowledge, ruled by a council of wise elders who value diplomacy and cooperation.

countries.name: Khyronia
countries.description: A land of ancient magic and forgotten lore. Khyronians are known for their mastery over the elements and their intricate network of ley lines.

cities.name: Arcturus' Spire
cities.description: A majestic city built upon a sacred site, where Arcturus resides as a respected mediator. Home to the Celestial Ballet and a hub of interdimensional commerce.

cities.name: Cormac's Citadel
cities.description: A foreboding fortress built upon a site of dark history, where Cormac Darkfire resides as a master manipulator. A hotbed of intrigue and counterplots.

landmarks.name: The Starfall
landmarks.description: A celestial event where stars align in the sky, believed to hold great significance for the inhabitants of Tha Altory. Occurs every 50 years.

landmarks.name: The Shadowfalls
landmarks.description: A treacherous mountain range known for its dark energies and unpredictable weather patterns. Home to various tribes of skilled warriors.

events.name: The Celestial Ballet's Formation
events.description: A group of star-weavers from different dimensions converged to create a celestial ballet, which became the cornerstone of interdimensional commerce and cooperation.
events.impact: Established Arcturus as a respected mediator and created a system for resolving conflicts between dimensional factions.

events.name: The Rise of Cormac Darkfire
events.description: A powerful sorcerer from Khyronia rose to prominence, manipulating events to further his own interests. Became a thorn in the side of Arcturus and the Celestial Ballet.
events.impact: Intensified power struggles between dimensional factions and created an atmosphere of distrust and paranoia.

events.name: The Shadowfalls Uprising
events.description: A group of skilled warriors from the Shadowfalls mountain range rose up against their ruling sorcerers, seeking greater autonomy and power.
events.impact: Led to a series of bloody conflicts between different tribes and factions within Tha Altory.

events.name: The Celestial Ballet's Intervention
events.description: Arcturus and the Celestial Ballet intervened in the Shadow Wars, using their influence to broker peace agreements and stabilize the realm.
events.impact: Established Arcturus as a respected mediator and created a system for resolving conflicts between dimensional factions.

cultures.name: The Starweavers
cultures.description: A group of celestial beings who weave the fabric of reality, maintaining balance and harmony within Tha Altory.
cultures.societyStructure: Hierarchical, with Arcturus as the respected mediator and leader. Members are chosen for their wisdom and ability to navigate complex interdimensional politics.
cultures.traditions: The Starweavers hold great respect for the celestial ballet, which they believe is a reflection of the cosmic balance within Tha Altory.

cultures.name: The Khyronians
cultures.description: A culture known for their mastery over magic and the elements. They value strength and cunning above all else.
cultures.societyStructure: Tribal, with powerful sorcerers ruling each tribe. Khyronians are known for their intricate network of ley lines and their ability to manipulate the fabric of reality.
cultures.traditions: Khyronians revere the Shadowfalls mountain range as a sacred site, believing it holds great power and significance.
